price: Kuma daga cikinsu akwai wadɗanda suka yi wa Allah alkawari, "Lalle ne idan ya kãwo mana daga falalarSa, haƙĩƙa, munãbãyar da sadaka, kuma lalle ne munã kasancẽwa, daga sãlihai."
arabic: ۞ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ عَٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنۡ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man ʿāhada al-laha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna mina al-ṣāliḥīna
